name: sussy.exe (totally normal game) (demo)
description:
a parody .exe game with funny memez.

story: your friend is developing an among us platformer in unity (it is bad but you dont say it). but after you visit his house one time you find a usb drive that says "dont plug in" so you do it anyway when you go to your house. but then you realize thats a bad idea

im making this to learn unity so dont expect much lol

also this is only a demo more to come.

some things im planning to do:

- add sussy menu

- make more like actual sonic.exe

- make more characters (first one to get ded is sus man/the webcomic that shall not be named)

- add linux and maybe mac port (i cant test mac so yeah sorry)

have fun lol

i would open source it but with the way unity works i dont know how to do that sorry
